org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr
Class AeExprFunctionExecutionContext

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.AeExprFunctionExecutionContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeFunctionExecutionContext
public class AeExprFunctionExecutionContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeFunctionExecutionContext

Implements an IAeExpressionContext. This implementation basically wraps the current expression runner context.
